EVILS EXTRA

AKNP-0013

"That there might be some essential secret hidden here... didn't seem likely."

mothy's sixteenth album featuring older tracks unreleased onto mothy's albums and new arranges along with one new song. The album was released on August 12, 2019, and is currently available on Toranoana.

Crossfade · Playlist · Booklet

Tracklist

  1. Genesis Girl Gretel
  2. Fictional Masquerade
  3. You Only Have to Double Jump
  4. Torture Tower Doesn't Sleep
  5. Messengers of the Infinity Mirrors
  6. That King was Born from Mud
  7. Full Moon Laboratory
  8. The Frog's and My Love Romance Sped Up
  9. Unlock Blackbox [Instrumental]
  10. Reach For The Stars ~The Letter She Kept Waiting For~
  11. The Song that Resounds with Lulila, Lulila (Parade)
  12. Ending Boy Hänsel

Notes

  • The album was illustrated by Ichika.
  • The beginning of the booklet features a piece of prose about Arte and Pollo finding records while cleaning Seth's room; the ending prose features Arte's thoughts as she continues to clean.
  • The lyrics pages for each song feature an alternate English title and a graphic of a disk; the disks' colors correspond to the vocals feaured in the song.
